Bldg. 2 (제2공학관 27동 27328호) Email: sungkil at skku.edu Phone: +82 31-290-7126 Curriculum Vitae: Sungkil Lee is a professor at Sungkyunkwan University, Korea. He obtained his PhD (2009) and BS (2002) degrees in computer science and engineering and materials science and engineering at POSTECH, Korea. He was a postdoctoral researcher at the Max-Planck-Institut (MPI) Informatik (2009--2011), and a visiting professor at Delft University of Technology (2017). His research interests include real-time GPU rendering, deep learning, view synthesis, GPU computing, optics, synthetic data, and virtual reality.
